Package algorithms.compGeometry.convexHull

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GrahamScan
    Solves the Convex Hull problem w/ a stack S of candidate points.
    PolarAngleMergeSort
    The algorithm uses a merge sort which has a worse case runtime is O(N * log_2(N)), but also includes an additional set of operations to remove inner points with the same polar angle from P0.
    XYStack  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GrahamScanTooFewPointsException
